dialogue.introduction: I'm Kiso. I'll bestow upon you the absolute best victory.
dialogue.library_intro: 5500 ton light cruiser, Kuma-class 'Kiso'. My regards. Runways and catapults, nah, I don't need those. Battle is all about bringing it right to the enemy! Right?
dialogue.secretary3: Now ya talking, skinship is important.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Someday, together with you... No, nothing. It's so unlike me too. Heh. (Kai Ni)
dialogue.wedding: It's a bit impudent, but your directions in battle send shivers through me, it's not bad!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Where's the fool that dares challenge me?
dialogue.equipment1: Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
dialogue.supply: Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
dialogue.docking_complete: Seems as though the ships have finished repairing.
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new ship has been constructed.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I'll teach them the meaning of a real battle!
dialogue.night_battle: Did you really think you could get away with that?
dialogue.night_attack: That's one incompetent commander you got there!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: That's one incompetent commander you got there!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: That's one incompetent commander you got there!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: That's one incompetent commander you got there!
dialogue.mvp: An inevitable result. No need to make a fuss about it.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Aaa... I can take this much!!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Well, it's just gotten a bit cooler
dialogue.sunk: To have been able to sink me, Kiso. Be proud of yourself
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: The rainy season makes the wounds on my body ache... Telling me, "Faster. Go faster."... Nah, don't mind me.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: The summer huh? Well, this season isn't bad at all. Hey, you too are going to the sea?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas cake...... Hmm, is it alright for it to be so sweet!? It's too sweet!!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Shipgirls' group choir competition? Ah, no. I'm not joining. I said I'm not joining in! Hey!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year. It is a pleasure to greet this new year with you. I'm counting on you for this year as well.
